operations.content:
version: 1
name: goal_flow_gap_5182
description: Stabilize scenario goals/flow_gap_5182.yaml
events:
  - event_id: 1
    type: http_request
    url: /api/stabilize
    method: POST
    headers:
      Content-Type: application/json
    body: |
      {
        "scenario": "goals/flow_gap_5182",
        "action": "stabilize"
      }
